targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  component AS metric,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'cpu'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  component AS metric,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'ram'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  rentals_bid AS "Bid",
  rentals_on_demand AS "On Demand",
  rentals_stored AS "Stored"
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  component AS metric,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'disk_space'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,1s),
  sum(power_consumption) + $power_offset AS "power_consumption"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,1s)

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  account_credit
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  account_credit AS "Account credit"
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,1s),
  (((sum(power_consumption) + $power_offset) / 1000) * $power_cost) * ((($__to - $__from) / 1000) / 60 / 60)  AS "Energy Cost      "
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,1s)

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,1s),
  ((sum(power_consumption) + $power_offset) / 1000) * $power_cost AS "Avg. Energy cost p/h"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,1s)

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "Power consumption",
  hw_id AS "HW ID",
  component AS "Component"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  power_consumption != ''
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "CPU"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'cpu'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 1"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 1
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 2"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 2
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 3"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 3
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 4"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 4
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 5"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 5
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 6"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 6
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  temperature AS "GPU 0"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 0
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 1"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 1
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 2"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 2
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 3"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 3
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 4"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 4
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 5"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 5
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 0"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 0
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "CPU"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'cpu'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 1"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 1
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 2"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 2
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 3"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 3
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 4"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 4
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 5"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 5
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 6"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 6
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  power_consumption AS "GPU 0"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 0
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  reliability
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  name,
  val1 AS "Container ID",
  val2 AS "Image name",
  val3 AS "GPU ID(s)"
FROM event
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time desc

list.definition:
SELECT
  count(*)
FROM instance
WHERE
  earning = '0'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time desc
limit 1
list.label: Idle GPUs
list.name: idle_gpus
list.query:
SELECT
  count(*)
FROM instance
WHERE
  earning = '0'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time desc
limit 1
